triples.name: Neural network (machine learning)
triples.relevance: Neural networks are used to approximate unknown internal dynamics in the nonlinear control system.

triples.name: Adaptive control
triples.relevance: Adaptive neural network output feedback control is the core technique proposed for handling uncertain system parameters.

triples.name: State observer
triples.relevance: An adaptive state observer is developed to estimate immeasurable states in the nonlinear system.

triples.name: Nonlinear control
triples.relevance: The paper addresses control design for strict-feedback nonlinear systems with unknown dynamics.

triples.name: Lyapunov function
triples.relevance: Barrier Lyapunov functions are employed to ensure system states remain within predefined compact sets and guarantee stability.

triples.name: Actor-critic algorithm
triples.relevance: The actor-critic architecture is used in the design of virtual and actual optimal controllers.

triples.name: Backstepping
triples.relevance: Backstepping technique is the fundamental control design framework for developing the optimal controllers for strict-feedback systems.

triples.name: Optimal control
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a novel observer-based neuro-adaptive optimized control design with barrier-type cost functions for constrained nonlinear systems.
